content:
```html

We are taking a break and will return on Wednesday, August 20.

React Status

  • JavaScript Isn’t the Problem, Replacing the Browser Was by Peter Pistorius
  • Embrace: User-Focused Observability for Mobile and Web (Sponsored)
  • Building a Full-Stack App with React and Aspire by Sayed Ibrahim Hashimi

In Brief:

  • TypeScript 5.9 released with import defer and expandable hovers.
  • Jack Herrington pits tRPC against oRPC in type-safe API battle.
  • Vercel AI SDK 5 released.
  • Minimal React framework Waku adopts Vite's official RSC plugin.
  • A project to reproduce macOS UI with React.
  • Unlocking Web Workers with React: A Step-by-Step Guide by Rahul M. Juliato
  • React Query Selectors, Supercharged by Dominik Dorfmeister
  • How Teams Like Cursor Stop Bots from Abusing Free Trials (Sponsored)
  • Component Testing with Storybook 9 and Vitest by Dominic Nguyen
  • How to Build An AI Assistant with LangGraph, Next.js, and Auth0 by Deepu K Sasidharan
  • Introducing Stan: A New State Management Library for TypeScript by Rafał Krupiński
  • We’ve Moved From TanStack Start to Next.js: Here's Why by LLM Gateway

Code, Tools & Libraries

  • FlashList v2: A High Performance List for React Native by Shopify
  • React Native Audio API by Software Mansion
  • React-Date-Picker 12.0 by Wojciech Maj
  • Relay 20.1
  • Storybook 9.1
  • React Stripe.js 3.9
  • react-json-view 1.27

Classifieds

  • Add barcode & QR scanning to your web app with STRICH.

Elsewhere in JavaScript

  • Update on ViteLand, including Vite 7.0, Rolldown, Oxlint, Vitest.
  • Significant performance improvements to JSON.stringify in V8 13.8.
  • Node.js v22.18.0 (LTS) can execute TypeScript natively.
  • Dan Abramov blogs about the Lean programming language.

See you again on Wednesday, August 20. Feel free to send submissions.

```
